remarks: Given a non-degenerate ray, there is a unique point congruent to the segment ` B C ` lying on the ray ` A R ` .  Theorem 6.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
outsideofeu $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ R e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( R =/= A /\ B =/= C ) -> E! x e. ( EE ` N ) ( A OutsideOf <. x , R >. /\ <. A , x >. Cgr <. B , C >. ) ) ) $.

$d B x $.
